name: UNV Wireless Surveillance Cameras Kit/WiFi NVR with 4 wifi Bullet IP Network Camera Combo KIT/301-04LB-W/4 * 2122SR3-F40W-D
short_description: . P.when("ReplacementPartsBulletLoader").execute(function(module){ module.initializeDPX(); }) Enjoy wireless: Embedded WiFi Module. Support CCMP encryption and WPA2-PSK authentication. Support IP Camera with WiFi access. Easy Access from mobile because it has an App that can be downloaded from ios or android (EZView). Has 4 channel input and support Ultra 265 Video formats. Support 1-ch of HDMI and 1-ch VGA. Also provided with HDMI and VGA synchronous outputs. Up to 1080p resolution for a good quality of recording. It also have 1 SATA HDD, Up to 10TB for each HDD. Have ANR technology to enhance the storage reliability and suppports Cloud Upgrade. Camera functions DAY/Night. Capable of 24/7 surveillance. Comes with smart infrared technology with a range of 30 meters for high clarity video at night. It has Optical glass window with higher light transmittance and IR anti-reflection window to increase the infrared transmittance . Can also be installed Outdoor because it has IP66 weatherproof.
product_description: Perfectly adapted to residential spaces where it may be difficult to install wiring, the Uniview plug-and-play WiFi Kit makes home video security easy. Enjoy access to your cameras at any moment with the free and easy-to-use mobile surveillance app for ios or android (EZView App). Capable of 24/7 surveillance, the cameras come with smart infrared technology with a range of 30 metres for high clarity video at night, and can be installed outdoors thanks to their IP66 weatherproof construction. Uniview design and manufacture high quality and reliable cameras.

name: YI 1080P Wifi Outdoor Camera Digital Zoom AI Human Auto Tracking Wireless IP Camera Audio IR Night Vision Security CCTV Cam(EU plug)
short_description: About this item Make it possible to monitor a wide area of coverage with a single security camera. Don't risk missing a second of the action. This camera captures rich and crisp 1080p high-definition video and images, recording every moment with sharp color contrast. Keep an eye on things even when you are not at home. YI Home App (available on iOS and Android devices) lets you play back the recordings or watch your home in real time. YI 1080p Outdoor PTZ camera equipped with 0°-350° pan, 90° tilt enables you to monitor 360° view on the YI Home App, no blind spots. YI 1080p Outdoor PTZ camera includes a unique zoom lens, that enables remote customization of your viewing area. Focus on a small area in details thanks to 4x optical zoom. It sends you alerts and push notifications at once if any motion is detected. Using highly sensitive algorithms, the outdoor camera reduces false alerts to only alert you of unwanted intruders, then use the deterrent alarm to send them a warning. High-quality material to withstand rainy, sunny, stormy, and even snowy days, with operating temperatures of -4℉~+140℉ (-20°C to +60°C), ensures the excellent year-round performance. You can rest assured that these cameras are made to outlast any extreme weather conditions that nature throws at them.

name: eufy Security Floodlight Cam 2 Pro, 360-Degree Pan and Tilt Coverage, 2K Full HD, Smart Lighting, Weatherproof, On-Device AI Subject Lock and Tracking, No Monthly Fee
short_description: About this item 360° Pan and Tilt Camera Coverage Pan the lens 360° horizontally to get a complete view without the risk of blind spots. 2K Full HD Catch all the details in full 2K HD when live-streaming and recording footage. Smart Lighting with 3 Tunable Light Panels Adjusts spotlight color temperature and brightness based on sunrise and sunset, schedules, and motion detection. AI Subject Lock and Tracking The on-device AI recognizes when a person is present then locks, tracks, and records the subject. Turn Night Into Day: 3,000-lumen super-bright motion-activated floodlights deter intruders and ensure detailed, full-color recordings even at night.
